src:
Liga Champions: 3 Tim Pastikan Tiket ke 16 Besar
06 Nov 2019, 23:23 by Terjemahan, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Tiga tim Eropa memastikan diri melaju ke babak 16 besar atau fase gugur Liga Champions. Mereka adalah Bayern Munchen, Juventus, dan Paris Saint-Germain.
Ketiganya berhasil merebut tiga poin pada pertandingan yang berjalan Kamis dini hari, 7 November 2019 waktu Indonesia. Bayern Munchen mengalahkan Olympiacos dua gol tanpa balas. Dua gol kemenangan Bayern dicetak oleh Lewandowski (menit ke-69) dan Perisic (89). Dengan hasil itu, Bayern duduk di peringkat pertama Grup B dengan 12 poin.
Pelatih sementara Bayern, Hansi Flick, menyatakan senang para pemain bisa tampil bagus di tengah situasi klub yang kurang ideal dengan tidak adanya pelatih utama dan beberapa pemain utama. "Kami mencoba tampil sesuai dengan apa yang sudah diterapkan di tempat latihan," kata Flick
Sementara Paris Saint-Germain menekuk Club Brugge dengan skor tipis 1-0. Gol tunggal Icardi pada menit ke-22 membuat posisi PSG kokoh di puncak Grup A dengan 12 poin.
Lalu Juventus mengalahkan Lokomotiv Moskow dengan skor 2-1. Dua gol Juventus dikemas oleh Aaron Ramsey (menit 4) dan Douglas Costa (90+3). Gol dari Lokomotiv dicetak oleh Aleksei Miranchuk di menit ke-12. Juventus kini kokoh di peringkat satu Grup D dengan 10 poin.

UEFA
text:
Champions League: 3 Teams to Ensure Ticket to the Big 16
Nov 6 2019, 23:23 by translations, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Three European teams made sure to advance to the last 16 or the Champions League knockout phase. They are Bayern Munich, Juventus and Paris Saint-Germain.
The three won three points in a match that runs early Thursday, November 7, 2019 Indonesian time. Bayern Munich beat Olympiacos two goals without reply. Bayern's two winning goals were scored by Lewandowski (69 minutes) and Perisic (89). With that result, Bayern sit in first place in Group B with 12 points.
Bayern's interim coach, Hansi Flick, said he was happy the players could perform well in the midst of a less than ideal club situation with the absence of a main coach and several main players. "We try to appear in accordance with what has been applied at the training ground," said Flick
While Paris Saint-Germain bent Club Brugge with a thin score of 1-0. Icardi's single goal in the 22nd minute put PSG firmly on top of Group A with 12 points.
Then Juventus defeated Lokomotiv Moscow by a score of 2-1. Two Juventus goals were scored by Aaron Ramsey (minute 4) and Douglas Costa (90 + 3). A goal from Lokomotiv was scored by Aleksei Miranchuk in the 12th minute. Juventus are now firmly ranked first in Group D with 10 points.

UEFA
